name: Simple AI
headline: AI Phone Assistant for Consumers
description: Simple AI places places AI calls to help you find things, call customer support, make reservations, and get things done.

founders.name: Catheryn Li, Founder
founders.description:
Cat is co-founder and CEO of Simple AI. Previously, she spent 4 years at Y Combinator, where she led the software team responsible for Startup School, the YC Library, and YC's Co-Founder Matching site.

She has degrees in computer science and math from MIT.

founders.name: Zach Kamran, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder Simple AI. Previously working on Bookface at YC.

generated_description:
### Simple AI: Your Voice-Powered Assistant

**Overview**  
Founded in 2024 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S24, Simple AI is a forward-thinking startup located in San Francisco. Their mission? To make your life easier through an AI Phone Assistant that handles everything from making reservations to navigating customer support lines—essentially, it’s like having a personal assistant who never sleeps.

**What They Do**  
Simple AI originally started as a service that made AI calls on behalf of consumers to help them find information, resolve issues, and handle various tasks over the phone. Now, they offer a mobile app designed to bring that same functionality directly to your pocket. You can use Simple AI for a range of use cases, including lead qualification, logistics coordination, customer support, and even acting as a virtual receptionist.

**Key Features**  
- **Fully Customizable**: Tailor every detail to suit your needs.
- **Scalability**: Handle thousands of calls and navigate complex phone trees seamlessly.
- **Multilingual Support**: Communicate in 29 languages right out of the box.
- **Integration-Friendly**: Connect with any API to enhance functionality, and easily transfer calls to human agents when necessary.

**Team and Support**  
Simple AI operates with a nimble team of two, guided by their Group Partner, Michael Seibel, a notable figure in the startup ecosystem. This lean approach allows for rapid development and iteration.

**Get Involved**  
Interested in trying it out? You can download the mobile app for free [here](https://www.usesimple.ai/</join?inviteCode=hero>).  

**Contact and Information**  
For more details, you can visit their [website](https://www.usesimple.ai) or check out their [blog](https://www.usesimple.ai/</blog>) for insights and updates. They also offer documentation to help you get started.

### Conclusion  
If you've ever wished for an efficient, reliable assistant to manage your calls and tasks, Simple AI might just have the solution you're looking for. With a vision powered by innovative technology and a focus on consumer needs, they are poised to make a significant impact in the realm of artificial intelligence.

Explore more: [Simple AI](https://www.usesimple.ai)
